Header: Ecuador judge orders former president Correa be jailed
Content: An Ecuadorean judge ordered that former President Rafael Correa be jailed for violating a judge’s order that he present himself in Ecuadorean courts every two weeks as part of a probe into the kidnapping of an opposition lawmaker. Correa instead presented himself at an Ecuadorean consulate in Belgium, where he lives.On his Twitter account, Correa called the decision a “farse.”Correa’s lawyer said he will appeal the judge’s decision.
